mapper.select:
SELECT A.aid, A.atitle, A.vcount, A.ctime, COUNT(B.cid) AS count FROM board AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN comment AS B ON A.aid = B.aid GROUP BY A.aid ORDER BY A.aid DESC
LIMIT #{offset}, 20
LIMIT 0, 20
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (user_id, atitle, abody) VALUES (#{userId}, #{atitle}, #{abody})
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET vcount = vcount + 1 WHERE aid = #{aid}
